summary: Target is a big American company that runs discount stores and hypermarkets. It started in Minneapolis in 1902 and grew through the years. The first Target store opened in 1962, and the company became very popular for its trendy and affordable products. Today, Target has over 1,900 stores in the U.S. and is one of the largest retailers. It sells clothes, household items, electronics, and groceries. Target is known for its bullseye logo and is a big part of American culture, competing with companies like Walmart and Amazon.
title: Target Corporation
